titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to C. W. Quiggins
CWG13948

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
323
March 8th 5
Maj C W Quiggins
1s Batl C. Gds
Catlettsburg Ky.
Major

I inclose herein a requisition approved by the Governor for fuel for Co 'L" of your command, for the month of March. This requisition was sent to me by Cap R Botts A. Q M for approval and return, But as the mustering and pay officer has left for Catlettsburg, Co L will be mustered out before this month Expires. You will have the requisition changed by Capt Botts to cover the time. will remain in service send the requisition to you in that you may see Capt B the matter.
